summary: Astronauts returning from a voyage to Mars are caught in a time warp and are propelled into a post-Apocalyptic Earth populated by mutants.
cast: Hugh Marlowe|Nancy Gates|Nelson Leigh|Rod Taylor|Shirley Patterson|Lisa Montell|Christopher Dark|Booth Colman|Everett Glass|Stanley Fraser|David Alpert|John Bleifer|Paul Brinegar|John Close|Walter Conrad|Hugh Corcoran|William Forman|Michael Garth|Mimi Gibson|John Hiestand|Nancy Howard|Don Kennedy|Rankin Mansfield|Strother Martin|Keith Richards|Mickey Simpson|William Vedder|Herb Vigran
keywords: deception|low budget film|psychotronic film|low budget sci fi movie|astronaut
title: Mundo sin fin
